review: I am using this in a basement, and it is working as expected so far. Only had buffering in an old movie once, but it did not throw me offline.  I guess from the not so good reviews I thought I would have more problems. I am very happy I bought this, so far!
author: Virginia M. Marciano

review: I am overall impressed with the fire stick but there are times when I have to unplug it because it freezes but when it's working it's one of the most exciting devices I've had in awhile I only wish they would have included the voice control stock for the price it was still a good find
author: Willie Sims

review: love it so far.  i use mainly netflix, prime movies/tv, prime music, pandora, watch espn, and flappy bird lol.  very quick connection to netflix.  i've watched a couple of prime movies too.  very nice if you have the prime service.
author: Zen Jeff

review: Not what I expected. Very limited apps and most of the movies are $6 to $20 which I feel is expensive. Response time is slow and the only thing I use it for is Netflix since I cannot browse the Internet.
author: Ceceilia

review: I like it needs more free movies or perks
author: Amazon Customer
